r.s: Indexed Gtk2 combo box similar to the HTML select box.
r.d: Indexed Gtk2 combo box similar to the HTML select box. Lets you not only store values as the normal GtkComboBox, but associated key/value pairs as well. The active key can be easily received with get_active_key.
r.n: - NULL values can be used to unset the value - get_array() method - unit tests
